page.title: 13Social concerns-Bromp on Swa
page.content:
We have a sports field in Brompton which the Parish Council is in charge of. People continually dump{garden {rubbish}and stones on it.
We have a Council rubbish tip near Brompton on which it is proposed to dump{asbestos}and we are concerned that it might expand and become a health hazard.
There are two bus shelters in the village and these get vandalised . There is also the problem of{graffiti especially in Colburn.
People are also concerned about{dogs fouling the pavements and parks.
The new primary school has a{nuclear {alarm}in the playground which worries some people.
